questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) In a field
D) Inside a museum

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A sports event
B) A family gathering
C) An informational sign in a natural area
D) A city street scene

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A sign
C) A building
D) A person

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A sign with the words "WINTER BURN"
B) A tree
C) A person
D) A building

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A beach
B) A forest
C) A field and trees
D) A cityscape

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A path
B) A sign
C) A bench
D) A car

What is the relationship between the elements in the photo?
A) The sign is in the foreground, with the field and trees in the background.
B) The sign is in the background, with a tree in the foreground.
C) The field is in the foreground, with the sign in the background.
D) The sign and the field are both in the background.

What does the sign say?
A) "SUMMER BURN"
B) "WINTER BURN"
C) "AUTUMN BURN"
D) "SPRING BURN

A) Blue
B) Green
C) Red-brown
D) Yellow

B) Rainy
C) Clear and sunny
D) Snowy

B) Coniferous trees
C) Deciduous trees
D) Fruit trees

A) Smooth and shiny

A) Taller than the grass
B) Shorter than the grass
